TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: Stellt Daten für ein Fokuswechselereignis bereit.

span.span: Provides data for a focus-changed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 idObject, int32 idChild) cil managed
Public Sub New (idObject As Integer, idChild As Integer)

param.name: idObject
param.span: Die [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] des Objekts, das den Fokus erhalten hat.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.

param.name: idChild
param.span: Die untergeordnete ID des Objekts, das den Fokus erhalten hat.

span.span: The child ID of the object that received focus.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Der `idObject` - `idChild` Parameter und der-Parameter enthalten die Objekt Bezeichner [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] , die Benutzeroberflächenautomatisierungs-Clients verwenden können, um eine mit einem- `IAccessible` Objekt in einer älteren, zugänglichen Technologie AnwendungThe `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChildId As Integer
public: property int ChildId { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: Ruft den untergeordneten [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)]-Bezeichner des Objekts ab, das den Fokus erhält.

span.span: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Objekt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] sind 32-Bit-Werte, die Kategorien von zugänglichen Objekten innerhalb einer Anwendung identifizieren.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. Der `idObject` - `idChild` Parameter und der-Parameter enthalten das-Objekt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] , das Clients verwenden können, um eine mit einem `IAccessible` Objekt in einer älteren, zugänglichen Technologie Anwendung zu verknüpfen.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectId As Integer
public: property int ObjectId { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: Ruft die [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] des [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)]-Objekts ab, das das Ereignis generiert hat.

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.

value.span: Die ID des [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] Elements, das den Fokus erhält.

span.span: The ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.

value.span: Mögliche Werte finden Sie unter [Objekt](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) Bezeichner in der Microsoft Active Accessibility-Dokumentation.

span.span: For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Objekt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] sind 32-Bit-Werte, die Kategorien von zugänglichen Objekten innerhalb einer Anwendung identifizieren.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. Der `idObject` - `idChild` Parameter und der-Parameter enthalten das-Objekt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] , das Clients verwenden können, um eine mit einem `IAccessible` Objekt in einer älteren, zugänglichen Technologie Anwendung zu verknüpfen.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
